sentences.sentence: In To Kill a Mockingbird, Harper Lee based Dill on her childhood friend, Truman Capote.
sentences.translation: 在《杀死一只知更鸟》中，哈珀·李以她儿时的朋友杜鲁门·卡波特为原型塑造了迪尔。

sentences.sentence: He is one of the few people acknowledged by Capote at the start of the book.
sentences.translation: 他是卡波特在书的开篇少数鸣谢的人之一。

sentences.sentence: She agreed to accompany Capote to act as what he called his "assistant researchist".
sentences.translation: 她同意陪同卡波特，做他所称的“助理研究员”。
